name: Untitled Dinosaur Game 🦖
description:
In this very small and weird simulation game, you find an abandoned (or should we say, isolated) egg and have to take care of it before it dies. And yes, of course you can pet it.

The prototype is in a very rough state as we had to pivot our design mid jam and cut corners. The "AI" is limited to simple hunger + mood driven behaviours and some random patterns to make it a little more alive.

We had fun making it, so we hope that you will have fun playing and experimenting with it.

This game was done for the AI & Games jam in 7 days.

Controls: ActionsMouse & KeyboardGamepadInteractLeft mouse button / touchscreennot supportedPause/SettingsEscapenot supported Debug viewF1not supported Credits:
  • Art: Michael "Calart" Pearson
  • Audio: "Bit Bionic"
  • Code: Matthew "Krikit" Schultz
  • Code: Colin Bellino
  • Design: Ondrej Markus and the rest of team.
  • Paid assets: No
  • Softwares: Godot, Aseprite, Audacity
Source code:
